Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: Rich selection of ready to serve Suriname cuisine. Something for everyone. Delicious spices you have not tasted before. This place is in my proven winner list.

Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: This Suriname take-away has been an old favourite of mine in de Pijp for years - when you're on a good thing, stick to it.  I'm a roti fanatic (the potatoes ...yum) and, trust me, I know no place in Amsterdam that does a better Surinaam-style roti. Or even a cheaper one, for that matter. Yummm.

Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: Brilliant curry, friendly service and very good portions. The Lamb Madras was nice and spicy, and we got free prawn crackers!

Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: My favourite local Surinamese cuisine!

Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: I love Perry's! I probably go there weekly. The food is delicious and they have soo many things, I want to try it all

Name: Perry's Exotisch Food
Review Text: We just came back from SE Asia and were craving spicy food while avoiding all the regional spices that we grew accustomed to during our trip. Surinamese food was the best choice! First of all Surinam has a big presence in the Netherlands ‚Ä¶

Review Text: The absolute BEST vegetarian roti in town, have been a loyal customer for years. The staff is always friendly.
